app_name: Unveiling Herstory: Women Painters Through the Ages

period1.title: Renaissance
characteristic: A period of cultural rebirth, marked by a focus on realism, perspective, and humanism
Showcasing the beauty of the natural world and the potential of the human mind and spirit

period2.title: Impressionism
characteristic: Capturing fleeting moments and sensory experiences through vibrant colors, loose brushwork, and the play of light
Conveying the immediate and ever-changing nature of modern life
